Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/54th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/54th.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Harding
ShortDescription: Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are rerouted via Cermak, Ogden, Central Park, then resume their normal route on Cermak due to street blockage near Cermak/Harding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ogden, Central Park, then resume their normal route on Cermak.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Cermak/Harding.
